Room.Name: Underground City
Room.ShortDescription: You have reached a dead end in the goblin underground shrine.
Room.LongDescription: The way is quite dark, and the light you have brought with you illuminates only a small circle around you. As your hand reaches out to the walls, you marvel at how smooth and dry the surface is. Not far from your hand is a heavy oak door which opens to the north. The door is bound with heavy metal.
